basic_node.title: Magnetic permeability of object material
basic_node.description: Magnetic permeability being the ratio of magnetic induction to a magnetic field within the considered material.
basic_node.references: [sp65, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-99895-4, p.5] [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271615002658] [sp46, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T.
